fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Berserker Rage** (2 uses): Choose a player and go into a wild frenzy, attacking them with unstoppable force. This attack will bypass all forms of defense and instantly kill the target. However, if your target is protected by a Doctor or Bodyguard, both you and the target will die in the ensuing chaos.
- **Rampage** (2 uses): Unleash your berserker fury upon the Town, attacking a random player each night with powerful force. This attack cannot be healed or blocked, but it can be intercepted by a Bodyguard.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- **Bloodlust**: During Tuesday and Friday, your attacks become even more devastating. Any player you attack will also have their Last Will and Death Note destroyed, preventing any valuable information from being left behind.
- **Unpredictable Rage**: Whenever you successfully kill a player, your next attack will have an unpredictable effect. It could either be a guaranteed kill, a redirection of the attack, or a complete failure. This effect will reset each night.
